ingredients.item: Â½ x pack 24 essential Waitrose British Lamb Meatballs
4 leaves essential Waitrose Curly Lettuce, shredded

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meatballs for 12 minutes, turning occasionally until cooked through with no pink meat.
Meanwhile, griddle the pittas for 1-2 minutes each side and split open, then fill with lettuce.
Mix together the tomatoes, cucumber and tzatziki, toss in the meatballs and use to fill the pittas. Serve.
